com.anthavio.httl.cache
Class CachingSender

java.lang.Object
  com.anthavio.httl.cache.CachingSender
All Implemented Interfaces:
ExtractionOperations, SenderOperations
public class CachingSender
extends Object
implements SenderOperations, ExtractionOperations

Sender warpper that caches Responses as they are recieved from remote server. Response body is stored in string or byte array. Only Responses are cached and extraction of the Response is performed every call. For extraction result caching use CachingExtractor For asynchronous/scheduled cache refreshing, executor service must be set.

Author:
martin.vanek
